item.title: About
item.description: First of all, my contacts: Email: kov4l3nko@gmail.com (you can use my PGP public key) Twitter: @kov4l3nko GitHub: @kov4l3nko Also I have Skype, Viber, Telegram, Signal and WhatsApp (shared by request) Then a quick word about the blog. I use Hugo static blog generator and DARKII2 theme developed by me specially for the blog. The blog is hosted on GitHub Pages. All header images for blog posts are from free photo stocks.
